#Introdcution

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
source(here::here("Scripts/setup.R"))
```


For this project, we will be forecasting the demand on bikes in the city of Nyon, Switzerland. We have data collected from a large Swiss bike-sharing company over several weeks in the spring of 2022. We will be looking into the following 13 different stations in Nyon:

  + `Nyon, Changins`
  + `Nyon, Débarcadère` 
  + `Nyon, Gare Sud` 
  + `Nyon, Piscine du Cossy` 
  + `Nyon, Hôpital` 
  + `Nyon, Petit Perdtemps`
  + `Nyon, Hostel` 
  + `Nyon, Place de Savoie` 
  + `Nyon, La Plage` 
  + `Nyon, Stade de Colovray` 
  + `Nyon, Triangle de l'Etraz` 
  + `Nyon, Gare Nord` 
  + `Nyon, Château`
